entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Showers or drizzle early in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
